--- Derek James <djames@...> wrote:
> That's what I'm calling it anyway...
> 
> http://nevt.sourceforge.net/
> 
> I released this in a pretty slapdash manner...I hope
> to 
> I've just bundled up the style sheets, DTDs, sample
> XML and SVG files
> into a .zip file.  There's also a user guide, which
> I hope to flesh
> out in better detail (the main thing it's missing
> right now is a good
> explanation of what the graphics actually show,
> though a lot of that
> can probably be intuited).  Anyway, I'll be updating
> the style sheets
> (and hopefully adding new ones) and user guide
> periodically.
<snip>
Does this require an ANN as described by NEAT code?

Suppose I have no code, but just a paper sketch of an
ANN with some neurons, connections, inputs, outputs,
etc.  Can I describe it with XML and then generate the
graphics?

If So I might find it quite useful.
